summary:
This mod does what the name suggests. It removes the Essential tag from nearly everybody in vanilla Skyrim. This means you can kill nearly everybody.

Warning: Killing certain people may break quests or questlines.

No DLCs required.
descriptionHtml:
This mod does what the name suggests. It removes the Essential tag from nearly everybody in vanilla Skyrim. This means you can kill nearly everybody. Some characters like the Jarls have something more than the Essential tag keeping them alive. So, as of this version, they can\'t be killed.

Warning: Killing certain people may break quests or questlines such as the Dark Brotherhood and Story.

No DLCs required.
author: RootbeerChugga
